channel.title: SkibblezScape [317 Delta] {Need Programmers!}
channel.description:
[center][anchor=index][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Other/images/skibblez.png[/img]
So I'm going to be developing a delta server based off of [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543033.0.html]Prenix World V1[/url], granted sebblol has done a lot to it already; however, I feel we can make it better. Delta does have a lot of features people overlook because of the oversized client.java
Index: 1. [iurl=#reqs]Team Requirements[/iurl] 2. [iurl=#apps]Applications[/iurl] 3. [iurl=#tobedone]Things to fix[/iurl] 4. [iurl=#done]Finished stuff[/iurl] 5. [iurl=#upnext]Soon to come[/iurl] 6. [iurl=#history]History[/iurl] 7. [iurl=#team]The Team[/iurl] 8. [iurl=#updates]Change Log[/iurl]
[anchor=reqs] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] Requirements to join the development team Must have: [url=http://www.teamviewer.com][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Dev/team-viewer.png[/img][/url][url=http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/messenger/home][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Dev/msn.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.skype.com][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Dev/skype.jpg[/img][/url] Images are links to the respected software [size=8pt]***Images are not mine and all credits go to their respected owners***[/size] To join the development team you need to meet these requirements (This does NOT apply to beta testers).
1. Proof you did what you say you have done (e.g pictures, source code) 2. Programming history, meaning no noobs 3. his one is the most important: Dedication *List subject to change within time
[anchor=apps] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] [u]Applications[/u] Application[For beta testers only]: [code] How old are you What are you going to look for in game Will you leak the IP/Client? How many hours/day will you play? [/code]
Application[for non beta testers]: [code]What position are you looking after: How old are you: Currently in school: Will you be dedicated to the project: Programming experience: Proof: Other information:[/code]
[anchor=tobedone] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] [u]Things to fix[/u] Red = Not in progress Yellow = In progress Green = Finished
Fix Clan Chat sprite bug. Fix slayer master. Slow down animation speeds (emotes happen way to fast.) Re-write All non-combat skills Have at least 2 worlds in the game (one with customs, one without). Members/Non-Members area: Would have members/non members items like real rs. Some customs in non custom client: Like armor that's in newer RuneScape. Fair and automatic donation system (Meaning you miss out if you don't donate) [Got the Idea from Lin] Fix Clan Chat. Fix Prayer icons. First Person that logs in is instant kicked [Loss of packet 2] Buys more then one item at times. [Interfaces] Fix cache download problem.
More to come...
[anchor=done] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] So far we have: Everything from the above topic, by sebblol. (Webclient not finished) A name (Has a history with me) A banner (Made by yours truly) Forums Webclient
[anchor=upnext] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] [u]Soon to come:[/u] Edited client sprites (such as background, login screen etc.) Second world Better handlers Better server host Highscores Vote4Cash And more....
[anchor=history] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] [u]History of the name 'SkibblezScape'[/u] Years ago when I was a we lad me and my friends were messing around. Some how some way we created the name 'Skibblez' from something (believe it had to do with skittles). Then I got into RSPS's and I decided to use Skibblez as the prefix, this was at the time where all RSPS's had 'Scape' at the end of their name. This is where the name came from. I had another server about 2 years ago named SkibblezScape and it too was a delta. But at the time servers weren't all that developed so well. I was also a horrid coder. Thinking that adding simple commands like "::god" was awesome. I still have the servers source but do not feel like using it since it's cache is horrid, and the server just isn't worth my time. But I keep it for memories. That's about it.
[anchor=team] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] [u]The Team[/u] Up to date as of: 5/27/2012
Server Coders[2/4]: Me Owner Zack Of PwnageScape Empty Empty
Client Coders[1/4]: Me Empty Empty Empty
Beta Testers[4/10]: codyth Str Pker CODER fier12 i am brenden empty empty empty empty empty empty
[anchor=updates] [iurl=#index]Back to top[/iurl] Update Log: 4/26/2012 [code]None, just starting looking at the client.[/code] 4/27/2012 [code]Fixed the Clan chat button[/code] 5/04/2012 [code]starting writing RandQm's Herblore skill[/code] 5/6/2012 [code] Finished up Herblore (RandQm's) Fixed equipment interface (thanks to Badger41's code)[/code] 5/8/2012 [code] Added RandQm's Agility skill[/code] 5/9/2012 [code] Added my own thieving handler (RandQm assisted me in making it, but I made most of it) [/code] 5/16/2012 [code] Nothing new programmed into the game Server now online for testing purposes only Now accepting applications for beta testers Website is a go. Link will be given to programmers/beta testers [/code] 5/27/2012 [code] Edited the thread a lot Added more beta testers and a programmer Fixed slayer master bug I want to give a special thanks to RandQm. As you can see he's been helping me a lot. [/center][/code]

item.title: SkibblezScape [317 Delta] {Need Programmers!}
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

How old are you - 14

What are you going to look for in game - I really what to look at the important stuff… Is combat working looking at the games such as --> f2p, castle wars, duel arena. And I would also look at almost every boss if they work, if drops work ect. Just the important stuff.

Will you leak the IP/Client? - I haven’t ever done that and no I won’t.

How many hours/day will you play? - as long as I can and sometimes maybe 2-4 hours a day.

Read full topic

Jesse I am a novice coder like you also, Id like to learn. I could always help. I do have a server ive kindof worked on. Not sure if thats enough proof for you but Id like to help

Sorry man, I need people that have a good understanding on what they are doing. I don’t want this project to go to waste.

Read full topic

What are you going to look for in game: the best of the servers and to not get board of it ever, and to help expand even more upon it.
Will you leak the IP/Client?no but if they really seems interested id send them here if it would be ok.

[quote=“codyth, post:26, topic:440667”]Hello there Jesse! Nice to see you again my friend!!! Please take the time to read my application for beta testing.

How old are you- I am 15
What are you going to look for in game- I am looking forward to help you try out your server and hopefully help make it one of the top servers.
Will you leak the IP/Client?- No, of course not. Why would someone do something like that?
How many hours/day will you play? - Well, Normally I play 6 hours on weekdays and 10+ on weekends.[/quote]

Accepted.
Sadly the first person that has been added to the team.
But beta testers are the easiest to accept.
I will PM you the info about the game.

How old are you- I am 15
What are you going to look for in game- I am looking forward to help you try out your server and hopefully help make it one of the top servers.
Will you leak the IP/Client?- No, of course not. Why would someone do something like that?
How many hours/day will you play? - Well, Normally I play 6 hours on weekdays and 10+ on weekends.

item.title: SkibblezScape [317 Delta] {Need Programmers!}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:24, topic:440667”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=543344.msg3987736#msg3987736 date=1336155242]
What position are you looking after: Programmer
How old are you: 17
Currently in school: Junior
Will you be dedicated to the project: Yes
Programming experience:
More Known: Co-Developer of Final Judgement

  • A few private projects used to keep myself occupied.
    Proof: N/A
    Other information: I am outgoing, and easy to get along with.
    [/quote][/quote]
    I’d like some proof before I consider adding you into my team.

[quote=“Owner Zack of PwnageScape, post:23, topic:440667”]What position are you looking after: I can be a programmer/coder for the server.
How old are you: I am 21 years old.
Currently in school: I have graduated from College.
Will you be dedicated to the project: I will be as dedicated as humanly possible to this project.
Programming experience: I have worked on multiple servers, including Project Rainbow [World 4], and I also have a under development website.
Proof: national-zstar.no-ip.org
If you want more proof, TV or MSN me.
Other information: MSN: zackzcookiez@yahoo.com
Skype: Zack.Smith.1990[/quote]

I’d like to see a little bit more proof besides just being able to look at some projects on your computer.

To everyone that has seen my thread:

I may seem strict when it comes to getting people for developing my server, but I don’t want kids that just slack off, ruin projects, or have no real programming experience.

I personally will admit I’m not the best at java but am learning.

[size=36pt]Thread Updated[/size]

Read full topic
